 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּג‎</span>] **verb** ==draw round, make a circle== (Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***circumivit***; noun <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חוּגְתָּא‎</span>, ***circle, vault of heavens***) — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹק חָג עלפֿני‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מים‎</span> [[Job.26.10|Job 26:10]] (compare [[Prov.8.27|Prov 8:27]]), ***hath drawn as a circle*** a bound, etc., of the horizon-line.
